name: Stormcaller
text: Legend tells of a great spiritual storm that forms the center of the natural world. This great, eternal upheaval represents the power and feral nature of the primal world. Spirits of the great wind ebb and flow around spirits of rain and thunder as aspects of lightning streak and flash in an eternal, chaotic mass. The chaos inherent in the great storm is equal only to the power that lies within it.

features.chargedCompanion(11thLevel): Whenever an enemy makes an attack against your spirit companion, that enemy takes lightning damage equal to your Wisdom modifier
features.drivingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier, and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square
features.stormcallerResistance(16thLevel): You and your spirit companion gain resist 10 thunder and resist 10 lightning

flavorText: I have seen the power of the great storm, and I choose to make it my own. I will cast you aside like a speck of dust on the wind.
